title: Easter leg of lamb
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon seasoned salt', '1/2 teaspoon dried marjoram', '1/4 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/8 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 (2.25kg) whole leg of lamb', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 orange peel, cut into thin strips', 'fresh mint, garnish']
